title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EC) No. 561/2006
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Road Transport)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Road Transport) 

(Working Conditions and Road Safety) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (road transport) (working condition road safety) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EC) No. 561/2006
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Regulations of 2023” means European Union (Road Transport) (Working 
Conditions and Road Safety) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 567 of 
2023); 

“Principal Regulations” means European Union (Road Transport) (Working 
Conditions and Road Safety) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 229 of 2017).
text_norm: 2 regulations-- regulation 2023 mean european union (road transport) (working condition road safety) (amendment) regulation 2023 (s.i no 567 2023) principal regulation mean european union (road transport) (working condition road safety) regulation 2017 (s.i no 229 2017)

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EC) No. 561/2006
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 
for the definition of “First Council Regulation” (inserted by Regulation 3(a)(i) 
of the Regulations of 2023) the following: 

“ ‘First Council Regulation’ means Council Regulation 561/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 15 March 20061, as amended 
by Regulation (EC) No. 1073/2009 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 21 October 20093, the Second Council Regulation, 
Regulation (EU) 2020/1054 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 15 July 20204 and Regulation (EU) 2024/1258 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 24 April 20242;”.

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EC) No. 561/2006
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended—
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended— 

(a) 

 in Regulation 41(1)(a), by substituting “16(2), (3), (4)(a) or 
(4)(b)” for “16(2) or (3)” (inserted by Regulation 24(a) of the 
Regulations of 2023), and 

(b) 

in Regulation 44(1)(b), by inserting “16(4)” after “12,”.

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EC) No. 561/2006
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the European Union (Road 
Transport) (Working Conditions and Road Safety) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 
229 of 2017) in line with the amendments made to Regulation (EC) 561/2006 by 
Regulation (EU) 2024/1258 of 24 April 2024 in regards to minimum 
requirements on minimum breaks and daily and weekly rest periods in the 
occasional passenger transport sector. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [163] 5
